definition: an unintentional but embarrassing blunder, make an error
details:
noun
- an unintentional but embarrassing blunder
= synonyms: trip
- an unsteady uneven gait
= synonyms: lurch, stagger
verb
- make an error
= synonyms: trip up, slip up
- miss a step and fall or nearly fall
= example: miss a step and fall or nearly fall
= synonyms: trip
- walk unsteadily
= example: walk unsteadily
= synonyms: waddle, falter, paddle, dodder, bumble, coggle, totter, toddle
- encounter by chance
= example: encounter by chance
= synonyms: hit
